p: Mature seeds of ‘Perseo-type’ maize ( Zea mays L.) and ‘Albufera-type’ rice ( Oryza sativa L.) were obtained from the cereals in Sueca (Valencia, Spain). ‘Huevo de toro-type’ tomato ( Solanum lycopersicum L.) seeds were directly acquired from the fruit found in the inner part in Utiel (Valencia, Spain).
